entity.name: Andrew Cuomo
entity.description: Governor of New York, Andrew Cuomo

text:
@thecjpearson @NYGovCuomo Yes, you are right, a hard intervention. I do not approve of acting like this. However, the start of bans in your country due to covid-19 causes an increased risk of covid-19. God bless all people. I hope this problem will surpass the whole world.
God be our helper.
